1.title: Flora The Explorah
1.description: Flor de Cana 7yr Rum, Smith & Cross Rum, hibiscus, lemon, egg white, Angostura bitters. The goddess of daquiri hits your lips. flowers heralds the Spring, and so will you after this floral

2.title: Herb Goddess (Temazcalteci)
2.description: Blanco Tequila, Devil-made strawberry-cilantro shrub, lemon, seltzer. Temazcalteci is the one who uses herbs to banish illness, we do too, we just also use tequila...

3.title: Strawman (Jarylo)
3.description: Gin, strawberry infused blanc vermouth, angostura, long pepper tincture. Nothing quite says fertility and springtime like the Slavic god Jarylo except maybe this delicious gin martini with a whisper of heat and strawberries.

4.title: She's Made of Oak (Blodeuwedd)
4.description: Rittenhouse Rye, Underberg, Bigallet China-China, maple syrup, Angostura bitters, oak smoke. She's bitter, she's sturdy, she's made of oak.

5.title: Pachamama (Incan Earth Mother)
5.description: Pisco, coconut, lime, Peychaud's bitters, absinthe- coconut whipped cream, rose buds. An Earth Mother deserves something floral and vibrant with a delectable whipped cream top!

6.title: Brigid's Fire
6.description: El Silencio Mezcal, Amaro Abano, Amontillado, ginger, honey, lemon, cinnamon. Just like Brigid's smith, this drink is on fire!

7.title: New Calendar (Mayahuel)
7.description: Mezcal, Green Chartreuse, ginger, jalapeno, lime. The Mayan goddess of fertility and agave needs another winning combination, hot, spicy, herbaceous, and smoky.

8.title: Diamond Bunnies (Eostre)
8.description: Barr Hill Tom Cat Gin, devil-made carrot miso cordial, lemon, devil-made Adult Fireball. Have you ever wanted to drink a carrot, but have it taste good? Now you can!

9.title: Fruit of the Devil (Persephone)
9.description: Reposadado tequila, pomegranate, grapefruit, ginger, mint, lime, honey, seltzer. Like the goddess who only spends half her time with the devil, this is light, with a touch of the darkness.

1.title: French Mistress
1.description: Cantaloupe-infused Aviation Gin, sparkling wine, lemon, agave, mint

2.title: Smoking Bagpipe
2.description: Speyburn 10yr Single Malt Scotch, pineapple, lime, chipotle maple, orange bitters

3.title: Sexting on the Beach
3.description: Vodka, oak-infused peach liqueur, sour orange, cranberry cordial

4.title: Match(a) Made in Hell
4.description: Pineapple Rum, Wray & Nephew overproof rum, Cointreau, Thai basil-matcha syrup, pineapple, lime, egg white, matcha powder.

5.title: Have a Dart (on draft)
5.description: Mezcal, Lillet Blanc, grapefruit, lime, honey, Peychaud's bitters, Maldon sea salt

6.title: Notorious F.I.G
6.description: Fig-infused cognac, Grand Marnier, house grenadine, lemon. There's nothing Smalls about this Figgy...

7.title: Saint Paul's Bone
7.description: Rye, Cynar, Aged Rum, Luxardo, crushed clove, Maldon salt. A deep profound flavor pairs well with existential dread.

8.title: No Rest For The Wicked
8.description: Coffee-infused mezcal, Contratto Bitter, Carpano Antica Sweet Vermouth, Cr√®me de Cacao, mole bitters

9.title: Rotating Milk Punch
9.description: Ask us what blasphemy we've created now!

10.title: Agassi's Mullet
10.description: Gin, Pimm's, cucumber water, lemon, cream, egg white, simple, ginger beer. This will take 10 minutes to make (Ramos style)

11.title: Apricot Sour
11.description: Cognac, Apricot Brandy, lemon, tonka syrup, egg white

12.title: Gift Certificate to OnlyFans
12.description: Aged rum, Mad River Vanilla Rum, passionfruit, lemon coconut, 'Billy's hot pepper juice', Lambrusco float

13.title: Red Banana
13.description: Barr Hill Gin, Barr Hill Tom Cat Gin, minted Ferne Carpano Antica sweet vermouth, ginger, Angostu bitters
